MR No. 1213 - Each Follower of Christ is Called to Work; All are to Copy Christ, the Pattern; Harmony to Prevail

     (Written at South Lancaster, Massachusetts, November 27, 1901.) 

     Sunday the 24th was a rainy, disagreeable day. I was surprised at the attendance in the hall in New York City. There was a very much larger number than we could reasonably have expected. I spoke from 1 John 3. The Lord gave me freedom in speaking His word. The blessing of the Lord seemed to attend the word spoken. May the Lord bless the hearers.
